alert.note: Alert for Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 8:47PM EDT until March 14 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Greenbrier County. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Blowing snow will cause reduced visibilities at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The public is encouraged to report snowfall amounts or wind damage to the National Weather Service via email at rnk.skywarn@noaa.gov...through Facebook or Twitter...or by calling 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Pictures are greatly appreciated. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
